sentences.pinyin: Tā shì yīgè kělián de háizi.

sentences.simplifiedText: 看着她可怜的样子，我决定把我的午饭分给她。
sentences.traditionalText: 看著她可憐的樣子，我決定把我的午餐分給她。
sentences.pinyin: Kàn zhe tā kělián de yàngzi, wǒ juédìng bǎ wǒ de wǔcān fēn gěi tā.
sentences.translation: Seeing her pitiful appearance, I decided to share my lunch with her.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他收养了这只流浪狗，因为他对它深深的可怜。
sentences.traditionalText: 他收養了這只流浪狗，因為他對它深深的可憐。
sentences.pinyin: tā shōuyǎngle zhè zhī liúlàng gǒu, yīnwèi tā duì tā shēnshēn de kělián.
sentences.translation: He adopted this stray dog because he deeply pitied it.
